fields.name: Alter Records:
fields.value: You will receive a list of players proportional to your score each night. Target a player and choose a role. They will appear as that role to investigations tonight.

fields.name: Mislead (x1, Charge 100%):
fields.value: During the Evening, target a player you share a Hello Neighbor with. At the start of the next Night, you will learn their role, and you choose to use your night action to alter their Night feedback however you wish. This can only be used per targeted player.
